毫.definition: hair; drawing brush; (in the) least; one thousandth; currency unit, 0.1 yuan

毫不.definition: hardly; not in the least; not at all

毫不介意.definition: to not mind (at all, a bit); to not care in the slightest

毫不留情.definition: to show no quarter; ruthless; relentless

毫不費力.definition: effortless; not expending the slightest effort

毫巴.definition: millibar (mbar or mb), unit of pressure (equal to hectopascal)

毫微米.definition: millimicron or one-millionth of a millimeter

毫毛.definition: fine hair (on the body); down; (often used figuratively as in 動毫毛|动毫毛[dong4hao2mao2] "to harm sb in the slightest way")

毫無.definition: not in the least; to completely lack

毫無保留.definition: to hold nothing back; without reservation

毫無效果.definition: to no avail; achieving nothing; totally ineffective; to have no effect; to fall flat (esp. of joke or speech that is completely ignored)

毫米汞柱.definition: millimeter of mercury; mmHg (unit of pressure)

毫釐不爽.definition: not to deviate an iota (idiom); to be extremely accurate

毫髮不爽.definition: not to deviate one hair's breadth (idiom); to be extremely accurate
